content.body: Dominic Farolino: I think children are managed explicitly nowadays, but parent is indeed not. I don't think I'd mind if we changed that, but someone would have to think it all through.
content.formatted_body: Dominic Farolino: I think children are managed explicitly nowadays, but parent is indeed not. I don't think I'd mind if we changed that, but someone would have to think it all through.
